attributes.action: The Mental Health and Social Care services are not fit for purpose and dangerous
attributes.additional_details: We know of other people suffering to a lesser or grater degree and things need to change or my mum and others will be harmed by incompetence and ignorance - which cannot be allowed to happen.
attributes.background: My mum has suffered with mental illness for >30 the care services have become incompetent such that now my mum is left to her own devices. The service is reactive without clear lines of communication or structure making it impossible for us to access / contact or do anything positive to help mum.

rejection.details:
Petitions must clearly seek action from the UK Government or Parliament.

If you would like the Government or Parliament to carry out an inquiry into the safety of mental health services and/or social care services, and to take action on the findings, you could start a petition about that.
